Title: Relates to creating the veterinarians across rural New York state student loan repayment fund
Summary: Relates to creating the veterinarians across rural New York state student loan repayment fund for certain veterinarians that make a two year commitment to practice in a tract or county defined by the health resources and services administration as being "rural" or eligible for a rural health grant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating the veterinarians across rural New York state student loan repayment fund
